testcase.name: Hacker News Accessibility Tests › should document accessibility status
testcase.system-out: Known accessibility issues: - Insufficient color contrast in UI elements (color-contrast) - Images missing alternative text (image-alt) - Form elements missing labels (label) - Links without discernible text (link-name)

testcase.name: Hacker News Accessibility Tests › should have proper heading structure
Hacker News Accessibility Tests › should have sufficient color contrast
Hacker News Accessibility Tests › should have proper ARIA attributes
Hacker News Article Sorting Tests › first page articles should be sorted from newest to oldest
Hacker News Article Sorting Tests › first 100 articles should be sorted from newest to oldest
Hacker News Article Sorting Tests › should handle page refresh and maintain order
Performance Tests › should load first page within performance budget
Performance Tests › should maintain performance during pagination
Performance Tests › should maintain stable memory usage during pagination
Performance Tests › should handle rate limiting gracefully
Performance Tests › should optimize DOM operations
